libsvm

Class LibSVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.javaml.classification.AbstractClassifier
      • libsvm.LibSVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Classifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SelfOptimizingLinearLibSVM

    public class LibSVM
extends AbstractClassifier
    Wrapper for the libSVM library by Chih-Chung Chang and Chih-Jen Lin. This class allows you to use the power of libSVM in Java-ML. 
     Chih-Chung Chang and Chih-Jen Lin, LIBSVM : a library for support vector
 machines, 2001. Software available at
 http://www.csie.ntu.edu.tw/˜cjlin/libsvm
    Author:
    Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(libsvm.svm_parameter param)
        Set the parameters that will be used for training.
        Parameters:
        param - a set of parameters

      • setPrintInterface

        public static void setPrintInterface(libsvm.svm_print_interface print)
        Set the print interface that will be used for training. print a print interface. If LibSVM.svm_print_console is provided then output will be printed to standard out. If LibSVM.svm_print_null is provided then no output will be printed. By default this the printmode is set to LibSVM.svm_print_null
